about.title: About Me
description: Data Engineer specialized in Lakehouse architectures and Modern Data Stack. I design and implement end-to-end solutions with dbt, Airflow, Spark and cloud-native platforms (Databricks, Snowflake, AWS).

I work across the full spectrum of data engineering, from real-time streaming pipelines to data-driven application development. I apply DataOps practices (CI/CD, IaC, automated testing) to deliver scalable and sustainable production solutions.
highlights: End-to-end BI architecture design with focus on self-service analytics
Lakehouse Architecture (Delta Lake, Iceberg) and dimensional modeling
Batch and streaming pipelines (Spark, Kafka, Airflow)
Data Governance, Quality and Observability in production
DataOps: CI/CD for data, infrastructure as code (Terraform)
Data integration for AI/ML and RAG systems
Cloud cost reduction up to 70% through optimization and right-sizing
Query optimization and performance at scale (TB+)
